Glory -- Female Engro Legendary Scout
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Spirited: +1 Spirit step
Skills (24 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4+2 Persuasion: (spi) d4+6
Athletics: (agi) d4 Knowledge (Alchemy): (sma) d10 Riding: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4+4 Knowledge (Folklore): (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d10
Fighting: (agi) d8 Occult: (sma) d6
Gambling: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d6
Languages: Engrosi
Skill Notes:
Brute: Advance Athletics relative to Strength/Use Strength vs. Athletics Tests
Heroic Status: +4 Reaction table/+4 Intimidation/+4 Persuasion/+4 Common Knowledge
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Noble: +2 Persuasion
Sneaky: +2 Skill Points (choice of Stealth or Thievery)
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): -2 arcane skill, +1 per extra round taken (+5 max)
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: -1 Deity: Maera
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 10 Glory: 240
Description Notes: Small (Engro): -1 Size
Features
Edges (8 points): Arcane Background (Heahwisardry); Beast Master; Block; Bolster; Brute; Command; Noble; Tough As Nails Hindrances: Big Mouth; Mild Mannered; Phobia; Poverty Engro Features: Luck (Engro); Outsider; Small (Engro); Sneaky; Spirited Glory Benefits (12 points): Combat Prowess: 1; Connections: 1; Favored: 1; Followers: 1; Heroic Aura: 1; Heroic Status: 4; Immortalized In Song: 1; Leader Of Men: 1; Sidekick: 1
Feature Notes:
Combat Prowess: +1 Edge Points (combat)
Leader Of Men: +1 Edge Points (leadership)
Noble: Has Rich feature
Beast Master: Has animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Command: R5" Commanded gain +1 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Connections: May call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Favored: +1 Benny each session
Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Immortalized In Song: Dbl number of followers
Luck (Engro): +1 Benny each session
Phobia: Suffers -1 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Rich: 3x starting funds
Sidekick: Has special bond with companion
Combat
Parry: 8 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Double Toothpick (d6+d6); Flail (d6+d6); Twin Toothpick (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Block: +1 Parry/-1 foe Gang Up bonus
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Heroic Aura: +1 Toughness in no armor
Small (Engro): -1 Toughness
Twin Toothpick Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d6
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Bolster: Successful foe Test removes Distracted or Vulnerable from ally
Brute: +1/+2/+4 thrown weapon range
Tough As Nails: Takes 4 wounds before incapacitated
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Farsight: (3 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 Notice within 20" and see 5 miles while maintained (+1 PP/additional target)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP) R10" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant can bite/claw for Str+d6 damage; +2 PP Servant has fly Pace 12; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses)
Teleport: (2 PP) R10" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24") (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Touch teleports foe (Spirit neg))
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
